5f65e559a3ad6a5ad43b9b8a37366999abd1b7084eb70721","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://b7bd24e224f67f65bfadf85dc2929fa965456bb2415478bd0125471b5ce35245","dweb:/ipfs/QmRaydGr8BTHs1kvaZfsNU69pKzUAGFrvABn1KiRSbE51y"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/Context.sol":{"keccak256":"0x493033a8d1b176a037b2cc6a04dad01a5c157722049bbecf632ca876224dd4b2","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://6a708e8a5bdb1011c2c381c9a5cfd8a9a956d7d0a9dc1bd8bcdaf52f76ef2f12","dweb:/ipfs/Qmax9WHBnVsZP46ZxEMNRQpLQnrdE4dK8LehML1Py8FowF"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/ReentrancyGuard.sol":{"keccak256":"0xf980daa263b661ab8ddee7d4fd833c7da7e7995e2c359ff1f17e67e4112f2236","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://7448ab095d6940130bcf76ba47a2eab14148c83119523b93dd89f6d84edd6c02","dweb:/ipfs/QmawrZ4voKQjH3oomXT3Kuheb3Mnmo2VvVpxg8Ne5UJUrd"]},"src/ProofOfInteraction.sol":{"keccak256":"0x06815961f40b945539aa9728c75109a897131a6e65c93e6d86d858ef7869e776","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://35ad9ef615618b07bb9eef2c66233df87187b33c65afa672c9e94d6f9995d208","dweb:/ipfs/QmWzWKxqnt3q4FHGgRMvC35voMgEWyrF2jZfrR83BpgS7c"]}},"version":1}

calculateRewards(uint256).details: Calculates the reward value for the interaction between two users

params._hashedUserIds: hashed user IDs of the users in the interaction

params._iceBreakerFee: fee to send an ice breaker
params._interactionCountWeight: weight for the interaction count-based reward
params.initialOwner: address of the owner of the contract

params._userA: user ID of the first user
params._userB: user ID of the second user

returns._0: interaction count between the two users

params._userA: user ID of the user to get the last reward time for
params._userB: user ID of the other user in the interaction

returns._0: last reward time for the user

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

rewardUsers(address,uint256,address,uint.details: Rewards multiple users with the calculated reward rate

sendIceBreaker(address).details: Sends an ice breaker fee to the treasury and emits an event

params._invitee: address of the user to send the ice breaker to

tipUser(address,uint256).details: Tips a user with the specified amount of BLUE tokens

params._amount: amount to tip the user in BLUE tokens
params._user: address of the user to tip

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdraw().details: Withdraws the contract balance to the owner

documentation.text:
@param _invitee address of the user to send the ice breaker to
 @dev Sends an ice breaker fee to the treasury and emits an event

@param _hashedUserIds hashed addresses of the users in the interaction
 @dev Increments the interaction count between two users
@return the minimum reward
@return the admin address
@return the base reward rate
@return the minimum reward interval
@return ice breaker fee

@param _admin address of the Admin contract
 @dev set the Admin contract address
@param _timeWeight new time weight

@param _interactionCountWeight new interaction count weight
 @dev Sets the interaction count weight

@param _iceBreakerFee new ice breaker fee
 @dev Sets the ice breaker fee

@param _baseRewardRate new reward rate
 @dev Sets the reward rate

@param _minReward new minimum reward
 @dev Sets the minimum reward

@param _minimumRewardInterval new minimum reward interval
 @dev Sets the minimum reward interval

@param _treasury address of the treasury
 @dev set the treasury address
@dev Withdraws the contract balance to the owner
